perturbation.original_text:
The following terms are defined for the purposes of this Agreement as follows:
     (a) "Acceptance" shall mean MBE's acknowledgment pursuant to Section 2
          ----------
below that (i) access to the Service has been granted, and (ii) the Service
functions in accordance with the Specifications.
perturbation.changed_text:
The following terms are defined for the purposes of this Agreement as follows:
     (a) "Acceptance" shall mean MBE's general satisfaction with the service.
perturbation.explanation: By modifying the definition of 'Acceptance,' the contract now lacks clarity on what constitutes formal acceptance. References to 'Specifications' in later sections will be ambiguous because the definition is overriden. This creates uncertainty in enforcement.

perturbation.original_text:
(u) "Specifications" shall mean the specifications for the Manifest set
          --------------
forth on Exhibit D, as updated from time to time during the term of this
         ---------Agreement in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: (u) "Specifications" shall mean general guidelines. Updates to those will be notified by email.
perturbation.explanation: Changing the definition of Specifications makes other references to Exhibit D and specific functional requirements unenforceable. This causes contradictions when service performance is evaluated.

perturbation.original_text:
(a) Basic Fee. In consideration for the Service provided hereunder, for
         ---------each package shipped utilizing the Service (other than a package which is
shipped first class by the U.S. Postal
                                      -9-
Service), the Company shall be entitled to receive the amount of [***]* (the
                                                                  ---
"Basic Fee"). MBE agrees to use its commercially reasonable efforts to execute
perturbation.changed_text: (a) Basic Fee. In consideration for the Service provided hereunder, for each package shipped utilizing the Service , the Company shall be entitled to receive a yet to be determined amount (the "Basic Fee"). MBE agrees to use its commercially reasonable efforts to execute
perturbation.explanation: By altering Basic Fee to a 'yet to be determined amount' causes a contradiction. The text following expects the execution of an agreemenet with a set Basic Fee, but it is missing from the text.
